actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to commend the Attorney General's Task Force on Violent Crime for drawing national attention to the plight of victims of crime and to urge the Attorney General to promulgate within the Department of Justice Standards for the Fair Treatment of Victims of Serious Crime.

summary.text: Commends the Attorney General's Task Force on Violent Crime for drawing national attention to the plight of victims of serious crime. Urges the Attorney General to promulgate specified standards recommended by the Task Force for the fair treatment of victims of crimes.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to commend the Attorney General's Task Force on Violent Crime for drawing national attention to the plight of victims of crime and to urge the Attorney General to promulgate within the Department of Justice Standards for the Fair Treatment of Victims of Serious Crime.
